record.field: Mail To Parent User In Request To Publish

% set company = ctx.get('company', user.company_id)
_header_

_msg_
${company.name}
${company.phone or ''} 		% if company.email:
${company.email}
% endif % if company.website: ${company.website} % endif
Abcd

div.p:
Thank you for choosing ${object.company_id.name}.
Attached is the Proforma Invoice for making the payment. Kindly contact us if you need any further information.

p.b:
Dear Customer,
We are sharing the below listings for your consideration.

Dear Customer,
We are sharing the below listings for your consideration.

Dear Customer,
We are sharing the below listing for your consideration.

% endif % if company.website: ${company.website} % endif

field.name: body_html

record.field: ${object.subject or (object.record_name and 'Re: %s' % object.record_name) or (object.parent_id and object.parent_id.subject and 'Re: %s' % object.parent_id.subject) or (object.parent_id and object.parent_id.record_name and 'Re: %s' % object.parent_id.record_name)}

% set company = ctx.get('company', user.company_id)
% if ctx.get('has_button_access'):
% endif % if not ctx['is_discussion'] or not len(ctx['actions']) == 0 or ctx.get('has_button_access'):
% if ctx.get('has_button_access'): ${ctx['button_access']['title']} % endif % if ctx.get('has_button_follow'): % if ctx.get('has_button_access'): | % endif ${ctx['button_follow']['title']} % elif ctx.get('has_button_unfollow'): % if ctx.get('has_button_access'): | % endif ${ctx['button_unfollow']['title']} % endif % if ctx.get('actions'): % for action in ctx['actions']: | ${action['title']} % endfor % endif
% if ctx.get('subtype') and ctx.get('subtype').internal:

Internal communication: Replying will post an internal note. Followers won't receive any email notification.

% endif
% endif
${object.body | safe}
% if ctx.get('tracking'):
    % for tracking in ctx['tracking']
  • ${tracking[0]} : ${tracking[1]} -> ${tracking[2]}
    • % endfor
% endif % if ctx.get('signature'): ${ctx['signature'] | safe} % endif

field.name: body_html
body_html
field.div:
Dear ${object.partner_id.name} % set access_action = object.with_context(force_website=True).get_access_action() % set is_online = access_action and access_action['type'] == 'ir.actions.act_url' % set access_url = object.get_mail_url()
% if object.partner_id.parent_id: (${object.partner_id.parent_id.name}) % endif ,
Here is, in attachment, your % if object.name: temporary receipt ${object.name} % else: temporary receipt % endif amounting in ${format_amount(object.net_amount, object.currency_id)} from ${object.company_id.name}.
% if object.state=='received':
This temporary receipt is already paid. % else:
Please remit payment at your earliest convenience. % endif
Thank you,
% if object.agent_id.user_id and object.agent_id.user_id.signature: ${object.agent_id.user_id.signature | safe} % endif

field.name: body_html

div.p:
Dear _recipient_name,
% if object.name:
Subject : ${object.name}
% endif % if object.start_datetime:
Start Time : _start_datetime
% endif % if object.stop_datetime:
End Time : _stop_datetime
% endif % if object.location:
Location : ${object.location}
% endif
_signature
